evidence.claim: Rubicon Benefits utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards for data protection and privacy.
They utilize FHIR for health data exchange.
X12 transaction sets are implemented for insurance claims processing.
Rubicon Benefits uses Azure for data storage and integration services.

icp.icp_reason: Company's focus on HIPAA compliance and EDI integration indicates strong alignment.
matched_use_cases: Integration with payers and providers using EDI
Real-time claim status updates with X12 276/277
